All Classes

Class Description
AlgoritmoGeradorPasswords
Current class represents the tool for creating new random passwords so that users can have access to the Platform and enjoy all of its functions.
AreaAtividade
Current class implements the tool for the Platform administrative to create a new activity area.
AuthenticationController
JavaFX controller works based on MVC(Model-View-Controller) and can be achieved by FXML (EFF-ects eXtended Markup Language).
CaracterizacaoCompTec
Technical competence characterization class allows to set a kind of mastery to the technical competence that may be (or not) mandatory for the task(s) in hand.
CategoriaTarefa
This class is funneled by the activity area class and hosts a list of technical competences.It is identified by a description.
CodigoUnico
Current class represents the tool for creating and condition new unique references either when instantiating objects of type Activity Area as for objects of type Technical Skill.
Colaborador
Current class represents the tool for creating new collaborators from an organization.
CompetenciaTecnica
Current class enables to create new technical competences, wich may or not be mandatory - defined in the CaracterizacaoCompTec Class.
DefinirAreaAtividadeController
Current class is the one responsible to connect the GUI with the methods responsible for setting new activity areas.
DefinirCategoriaTarefaController
Current class is the one responsible to connect the GUI with the methods responsible for setting new task categories.
DefinirCompetenciaTecnicaController
Current class is the one responsible to connect the GUI with the methods responsible for setting new technical competences.
DefinirTarefaController
Current class is the one responsible to connect the GUI with the methods responsible for setting new tasks.
Email
Current class implements the tools to create new emails (as Email) following certain rules how an email should be.
EnderecoPostal
Current class implements the tool for creating new addresses (as EnderecoPostal) with specific parameters such as street data (local), city and country (optional) data (localidade) and a post code.
Funcao
Current class is an Enum class that gives us the options available for the roles that a member of an organization (Organizacao) can have.
GrauProficiencia
Current class is an Enum class that gives us the options available for the proficiency degrees (as GrauProficiencia) that a technical competence (Competencia Tecnica) can have.
NIF
Current class implements the tools to create new tax id numbers (as NIF).
Organizacao
Current class implements the tools for creating new organizations (as Organizacao) with specific parameters such as name (nome), tax id number (nif), website, phone number (telefone), email, address and a manager (gestor).
Plataforma
Current class enables to create a new Platform object which hosts some of the critical functions available in the app.
PlataformaController
Current class is the one responsible to connect the GUI with the methods responsible for some of the critical functions that the Singleton class Platform (the class where the app runs around) hosts methods to save or load data via files, or establish/reset the connection to the users API among others.
RegistarColaboradorController
Current class is the one responsible to connect the GUI with the methods responsible for registering new collaborators.
RegistarOrganizacaoController
Current class is the one responsible to connect the GUI with the methods responsible for registering new organizations.
RepositorioAreaAtividade
Class responsible for creating a repository to store information about activity areas.
RepositorioCategoriaTarefa
Class responsible for creating a repository to store information about task categories.
RepositorioColaborador
Class responsible for creating a repository to store information about collaborator.
RepositorioCompetenciaTecnica
Class responsible for creating a repository to store information about technical competence.
RepositorioOrganizacao
Class responsible for creating a repository to store information about organization.
RepositorioTarefa
Class responsible for creating a repository to store information about Task.
RepositorioUtilizador
Class responsible for creating a repository to store information about User.
Role
Current class is an Enum class that gives us the options available for the roles that a user of the platform (Plataforma) can have.
Tarefa
Current class implements the tools for creating new tasks (as Tarefa) with specific parameters such as unique code (codigoUnico), designation (designacao), informal description (descricaoInformal), technical description (descricaoTecnica), estimated time to complete the task (duracaoHoras), estimated cost to perform the task (custo), the task category it falls under (categoria) and the organization that belongs (organizacao).
Telefone
Current class implements the tools to create new phone numbers (as Telefone).
User
Current class enables to create a new User object which hosts some of the critical functions available in the app, such as getting or setting parameters like username, password, email and the role.
UsersAPI
Current class is the one responsible to connect the GUI with the methods responsible for creating interfaces between the model and webservice (usersAPIAdapter).
UsersAPIAdapter
Current class is the one responsible to connect and make requests between the app and the to the web service.
Website
Current class implements the tools to create new websites (as Website).
